document.full_text: google inc is close to settling a u.s. criminal probe into allegations that it made hundreds of millions of dollars from online pharmacy ads that break u.s. laws, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
document.title: google nears settlement over drugstore ads: report
lines_and_colors: google inc is close to settling a u.s. criminal probe into allegations that it made hundreds of millions of dollars from online pharmacy ads that break u.s. laws, the wall street journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
